title: Advanced English Vocabulary Acquisition Program Utilizing Inference-Based Digital Games

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and comprehension of job-related technical terminology
context.additional_context: Project-based learning applying digital game-based vocabulary acquisition in a BYOD environment to real-world work scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can infer and acquire 50 advanced work-related vocabulary items with over 80% accuracy over five days
Learners can accurately explain contextual meanings of vocabulary by over 70% through reasoning processes within digital games
Learners can submit PBL deliverables reflecting actual work situations by utilizing acquired vocabulary
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
